items.quote: Liza helped me go from 5K to 100K subs in 8 months. The keyword research alone is worth 10x the price.
items.author: Marcus Chen

items.quote: I used to spend 4 hours a week on research. Now it's 20 minutes. Liza's AI is incredibly accurate.
items.author: Sarah Williams

items.quote: Managing 12 client accounts was chaos. Now I schedule everything from one dashboard.
items.author: James Rodriguez
